name: Hidden Costs
objective: bring enchanting tools to Baldrick the Enchanter
first_tasks: search Path of the Honored Dead for a Beornen

reward.description: the player's first enchantment, free of charge

characters.name: Beornen
characters.description: a male bear-mage with enchanting tools

tools: Baldrick the Enchanter can't enchant anything without enchanting tools
description:
Welcome! Welcome, my friend. I have numerous enchantments available... weapons, armor, trinkets, and the like. Or, rather, I would, if I hadn't lost my enchantment kit!
Maybe you can help me. I've heard there's a Beornen shaman or something out in the Path of the Honored Dead, who has the kind of enchanting tools I need. If you could locate this bear-mage and acquire those tools, I would happily give you your first enchantment, free of charge!

name: Little Lost Ones
objective: help Bellethe find Finnas and their precious animals
first_tasks: find Finnas

first_task_locations.name: Widow's Veil
first_task_locations.description: a cave inhabited by nasty creatures

quest_giver.name: Bellethe
quest_giver.description: a worried wife, and a passionate animal owner

tools: Bellethe and Finnas are homesteaders with a small farm in the Frosted Hills: they went to get supplies from Estherian Enclave before winter
description:
Please, help me! Our dear little ones wandered into that cave! My husband Finnas ventured after them, but it is crawling with nasty creatures, and he hasn't returned!
My husband Finnas and I were on our way to the Estherian Enclave. We're homesteaders, with a small farm in the Frosted Hills. The weather is getting harsh, so we were making one last run for supplies before winter. Oh, I'm beside myself with worry! Please, find Finnas and our precious babies! You have to help us! You could have a special item as a token of our gratitude!

name: The Thing
objective: destroy the Thing before it infects the whole world
first_tasks: find the Thing

quest_giver.name: Blair
quest_giver.description: a researcher, giving quest via "Blair's Notes"

items.name: "Blair's Notes"
items.description: notes on the discovery of the Thing

tools: the Thing got in Bennings, but then Fuchs disappeared
description:
"Blair's Notes"
by Blair

It was in the ice. Who knows how long? But it wasn't dead. And now it's hiding, here somewhere... in one of us. We found it in Bennings, but then Fuchs disappeared. It's still here, and it's looking for a way out. If it gets out into the world, it can infect everyone, everywhere. Three years, at most. Gods forgive us for what we've set loose upon the world.

name: Bounty: Sturmbeorn!
objective: alleviate the threat of the Sturmbeorn
first_tasks: kill 10 Sturmbeorn

quest_giver.name: Commander Vale
quest_giver.description: the leader of the Vanquisher Corps, giving quest via "Bounty Board"

reward.description: bounty

enemies.name: Sturmbeorn
enemies.description: savage raiders attacking the Estherians and the settlers of the Empire

tools: NONE
description:
BOUNTY!
The Sturmbeorn raiders are a threat to the Estherians and to the brave settlers of the Empire. Commander Vale is authorized to pay a reward to anyone who assists the Vanquisher Corps in ridding the Temple Steppes of these savage brutes.
This bounty shall be paid to anyone who slays 10 or more Sturmbeorn in the Temple Steppes.

name: Bounty: Warbeasts!
objective: help colonists by thinning out packs of Warbeasts
first_tasks: kill 10 Warbeasts

quest_giver.name: Commander Vale
quest_giver.description: the leader of the Vanquisher Corps, giving quest via "Bounty Board"

tools: NONE
description:
BOUNTY!
Commander Vale of the Vanquisher Corps is offering a reward to anyone who can help thin out the packs of Warbeasts hampering colonization and defense efforts in Estheria.
This reward shall be paid to anyone who slays 10 or more Warbeasts in the Temple Steppes.

name: Cacklespit's Brew
objective: collect ingredients for Cacklespit's brew
first_tasks: get Mask of a Murderer, Thorns as Hard as Iron, and Black Heart of a Coward

reward.description: a special concoction that will make the player famous for generations to come

tools: NONE
description:
Another customer for one of old Cacklespit's brews, eh? I can provide a special concoction, free of charge...if you aren't afraid to get your hands a little dirty.
As any true cook will tell you, the finest ingredients are of the utmost importance if you want to create something truly special. I will require three items to brew the special mixture I have in mind...
The Mask of a Murderer, Thorns as Hard as Iron, and the Black Heart of a Coward.
All three are to be found here in the bogs - you only have to find them!
Once I brew the ingredients properly, your name will be known for generations to come!

name: Heartfire
objective: recover the Heartfire Stone for yourself
first_tasks: claim the key to Vyrax's Tower

quest_giver.name: Cam
quest_giver.description: a researcher the player has helped before

reward.name: Heartfire Stone
reward.description: a rare and powerful artifact the confers to its wielder the power of dragonfire

locations.description: Vyrax's Tower, a tower in Rivenskull Gorge

characters.name: Vyrax
characters.description: an ancient dragon who has hoarded treasure

tools: NONE
description:
Hello again! I think I may be able to repay the favor you've done for us.
I've been doing some research, and have uncovered some interesting information about Vyrax, the ancient dragon who still dwells in the tower in Rivenskull Gorge.
The interesting bit is this - Vyrax has amidst his hoard a Heartfire Stone, which confers to its wielder the power of dragonfire. It is a rare and powerful artifact that would surely aid you.
If you wish to find the Heartfire Stone, you will need to first claim the key to Vyrax's Tower, in the depths of the Forgotten Halls.
Good luck!

name: Truffle Kerfuffle
objective: bring 12 Ember Truffles to Clive
first_tasks: gather 12 Ember Truffles

quest_giver.name: Clive
quest_giver.description: a botanist working for the Empire

reward.name: Super Mana Potion
reward.description: a potion

tools: NONE
description:
I'm a botanist, serving the Empire by gathering various Ember-infused plants.  And I've found a virtual treasure trove of Ember Truffles, down in the Muckery... but some of them have already attained sentience, and that's making it difficult for me to gather them.
If you can bring me, say, a dozen Ember Truffles, I'll keep ten for the Empire, and I'll use the other two to make a Super Mana Potion for you.
Do we have a deal?

name: Protect the Guardian!
objective: protect the Guardian of Water
first_tasks: scout the Wellspring Temple
tools: Commander Vale believes that the Alchemist might attack the Wellspring Temple: the Alchemist wants to reach the Guardian of Water
description:
Commander Vale believes that the Alchemist might attack the Wellspring Temple, in an attempt to reach the Guardian of Water ... for what nefarious purpose I am afraid to speculate. There has been no word from either Vale, or the Guardian.
Scout the Wellspring Temple, and determine if the Guardian of Water is in any danger.

name: Regroup at the Enclave
objective: plan your next move with Commander Vale
first_tasks: return to the Estherian Enclave

quest_giver.name: Guardian of Water
quest_giver.description: a powerful spirit of nature who was attacked by the Alchemist, one of the Guardians

tools: the Alchemist gets more dangerous each time he siphons off energy from Guardians
description:
The Alchemist must be stopped before he attacks any more Guardians! Each time he siphons off our energy, he becomes more dangerous.
You and Commander Vale should return the Estherian Enclave, and plan your next move.

name: Return to the Enclave
objective: stop the Alchemist before it's too late
first_tasks: go to the Ossean Wastes with the help of Commander Vale

characters.name: Alchemist
characters.description: a man who has Ordrak's Heart

tools: Ordrak's Heart wreaking havoc
the Guardian wants the player to go to the Ossean Wastes
description:
I don't know if the Alchemist understands that Ordrak's Heart is wreaking such havoc... or if he just doesn't care! I hope there's still a chance to stop him, one way or another, before it's too late.
So the Guardian wants you to head to the Ossean Wastes? You know what? I think I can help you with that...

name: Trail of the Grand Regent
objective: go to the Watchweald Temple
first_tasks: take Crows' Pass to the Frosted Hills to catch up to the Grand Regent before he enters the Watchweald Temple

characters.name: Grand Regent
characters.description: a male Estherian infected with the plague

tools: this plague targets beings of an inherently magical nature, not humans
description:
This plague seems to specifically target beings of an inherently magical nature, such as the Estherians. So far it's not affecting humans, so I've sent for a transport to bring us some medical supplies, and I'll be coordinating the medical relief here.
Meanwhile, you need to get out to the Watchweald Temple. Take Crows' Pass to the Frosted Hills. Try to catch up to the Grand Regent before he enters the temple.

name: Warn the Estherians
objective: head up the pass to the Enclave, and warn the Estherians that the Alchemist is coming to them
first_tasks: find Commander Vale and let her know what happened

characters.name: Commander Vale
characters.description: a woman, an old friend to the Destroyer

tools: the Alchemist destroyed Torchlight
description:
Someone needs to warn the Estherians. Head up the pass to their Enclave. Find my old friend, Commander Vale, and let her know what happened.
Tell them that the Alchemist destroyed Torchlight, and is headed their way. He may be there already...

name: The Brave Ones
objective: destroy the Ezrohir machines that pump "Manatoxin" in Zeryphesh's water supply
first_tasks: enter the Undercurrents

first_task_locations.name: Undercurrents
first_task_locations.description: a sewer in Zeryphesh, inhabited by poisonous creatures

reward.description: Dilawar will reward the player

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a race of people hostile to the Zeraphi

items.name: "Manatoxin"
items.description: a poison designed to disrupt Zeraphi physiology, created by Ezrohir

tools: NONE
description:
My friend, I need your help! My squad and I had observed a group of Ezrohir moving in and out of the Undercurrents. They have installed machines to pump a virulent poison into the city's water supply. Their "Manatoxin" is specifically designed to disrupt Zeraphi physiology. Unfortunately, the noxious atmosphere seems to have attracted a horde of poisonous beasts, and I only just escaped with my life. If you can enter the Undercurrents and destroy those machines for me, I will reward you. What do you say?
I won't lie to you: Destroying those machines won't be simple... but it's vital, and you're the only one who can do it.

name: Risk and Reward
objective: meet Duros the Blade in Zeryphesh
first_tasks: see if your luck holds out
tools: the player saved Duros the Blade from imprisonment
description: Finally saved! Thank you! You look like a person who likes risk! I'm heading back to town now. Meet me there and see if your luck holds out!

name: Wash Away My Sins
objective: set Edovar free
first_tasks: return the Glyph of Balthazar

quest_giver.name: Edovar
quest_giver.description: a spirit of an ambitious thief

items.name: Glyph of Balthazar
items.description: an artifact that has power over water

tools: Edovar stole the Glyph of Balthazar from the Wellspring Basin: he died while trying to use the Glyph of Balthazar and was trapped drowning forever
description:
I am merely spirit, but I mean you no harm. In life, I was an ambitious thief, and I thought I was invincible. My greatest achievement was when I stole the Glyph of Balthazar from the Wellspring Basin. I thought I could master its power over water, but I was very, very wrong.
Now I am trapped here in eternal torment, drowning forever, unable to rectify my mistake. Will you return the Glyph of Balthazar to the Wellspring Basin, and set my spirit free at last?

name: Hostage Negotiations
objective: defeat Kidrik the Mauler, and free his hostages
first_tasks: find Kidrik the Mauler and his captives

characters.name: Kidrik the Mauler
characters.description: the male leader of the slavers

tools: Kidrik the Mauler slipped away during the attack
description:
Kidrik the Mauler must have slipped away during the attack, and concealed himself in the underground slave den! And, if the captives are there, as well, Kidrik must be holding them hostage!
You must defeat Kidrik and free the captives, or all that has been done to stop the slavers will have been for naught!

name: Up In Smoke
objective: put the slavers out of the picture for good
first_tasks: burn down the slavers' houses

first_task_locations.name: Slavers' Camp
first_task_locations.description: home of the slavers who have been harassing the Estherians, in the Frosted Hills

tools: the player freed Elder Josimon from the slavers: he had recovered the Passkey Ember from them, but they captured him
description:
Thank you for rescuing me. I had recovered the Passkey Ember from these slavers, but they captured me as I was trying to return to the Enclave.
I could use your help with one small matter before you go. These slavers have been harrying the Estherians for several weeks now. You defeated many, but there are many more watching us from the safety of those huts. Burn them out! If they are allowed to remain, the Frosted Hills will never be safe.

name: The Ember Keys
objective: use the Ember Keys to open the Watchweald Portal
first_tasks: get the Passkey Ember from the slavers, and Latchkey Ember from the goblins

quest_giver.name: Elder Valin
quest_giver.description: a man who was planning to enter the Watchweald Portal

items.name: Ember Keys
items.description: the keys that are used to open the Watchweald Portal

locations.name: Watchweald Portal
locations.description: a portal in the Old Estherian Refuge

tools: NONE
description:
I was planning to enter the Watchweald Portal in the Old Estherian Refuge. Unfortunately the keys have been stolen. Goblin miners took one, and we believe that some slavers who recently moved into the area have the other. It takes both keys to activate the Watchweald Portal... and it is beyond my abilities to retrieve them.
Recover the Passkey Ember from the slavers, and the Latchkey Ember from the goblins. You can use them to open the Portal in the Refuge.

name: The Locket
objective: kill the Wraith Lord and find Estherian Spectre's remains along the Locket
first_tasks: find the Sanguine Gems
place the Sanguine Gems on the altars to open the path to the Wraith Lord

first_task_locations.description: the depths beyond the Rotting Crypt

quest_giver.name: Estherian Spectre
quest_giver.description: a ghost of a man who is bound to the Rotting Crypt
quest_giver.location: near the altars in the Rotting Crypt

tools: NONE
description:
I am bound to this place, and may not pass beyond the threshold. 
If you seek my remains, you must find the Sanguine Gems - they may be found in the depths beyond. Place them upon these altars, and the path to the Wraith Lord will be revealed.
If you can best him, you will discover my remains there - and the Locket Jessa seeks.

name: Cacklespit's Realm
objective: bring 4 skulls of famous warriors to Fade
first_tasks: find 4 skulls of famous warriors

quest_giver.name: Fade
quest_giver.description: an immortal spirit who covets the remains of the living

reward.description: Fade shows the player the way to Cacklespit's Realm

tools: the player has summoned Fade: the player wants to enter Cacklespit's Realm
description:
I am Fade - why have you summoned me?
Ah, you want to enter Cacklespit's hidden realm. Yes, I know the way - but I do not provide service without compensation.
I have very particular... appetites. The remains of the living are infused with a lingering residue of deeds past, which sustains me. Bring me the skulls of four warriors of renown, and I will take you where you wish to go. This battlefield is littered with the bones of great heroes. Your search should not be difficult.

name: The Djinni's Final Task
objective: free the Guardian by humiliating Ezrek Khan
first_tasks: steal Ezrek Khan's Lamp of Marvels

characters.name: Guardian
characters.description: the player's ally who was enchanted by Ezrek Khan

characters.name: Ezrek Khan
characters.description: a male djinni, and Fazeer Shah's old rival

tools: the player successfully completed their previous tasks to Fazeer Shah: this is the player's final task
Ezrek Khan draws his power from the same source as the Netherim: the Netherim will oppose the player should they challenge Ezrek Khan
description:
Well, well. You are much more determined... and capable... than I had suspected! Excellent...
Now, to your final task. If you truly wish to free the Guardian, you must humiliate my old rival, Ezrek Khan, by stealing his precious Lamp of Marvels.
Be warned: Ezrek Khan draws his power from the same source as the Netherim. His realm borders closely on theirs; they will almost certainly stand against you, should you challenge the djinni.

name: The Djinni's First Task
objective: perform three tasks for Fazeer Shah's amusement
first_tasks: recover Fazeer Shah's Lamp of Wonders from the Tu'tara

reward.description: Fazeer Shah will undo whatever the Artificer and the Alchemist have done to the Guardian

characters.name: Guardian
characters.description: the player's ally who was enchanted by the Artificer and the Alchemist

characters.name: Artificer
characters.description: a powerful man, and the player's enemy

characters.name: Alchemist
characters.description: an evil, powerful man allied with the Artificer

tools: NONE
description:
The Artificer and the Alchemist might be formidable, but even their combined powers are nothing more than parlor tricks to one such as me. I can easily undo anything that they have done to your "Guardian." I will of course require something in return.
My only real enemy in this desert is boredom. I will make you a bargain: Perform three tasks for my amusement. If your struggles provide suitable entertainment, then, and only then, will I free your Guardian.
Your first task: Journey to the Sadwa Mesa, and recover my Lamp of Wonders from the Tu'tara!

name: The Djinni's Next Task
objective: complete Fazeer Shah's second task
first_tasks: survive
tools: the player survived Fazeer Shah's first task with the Tu'tara
description:
You survived the Tu'tara more or less in one piece. Congratulations. But it occurs to me that you didn't do anything that you wouldn't ordinarily have done. This second task should prove much more amusing.
Step through the Portal. Your second task... is to survive!

name: The Adventure Continues
objective: restart your adventure
first_tasks: ask Felicia to show you the way
tools: NONE
description: You seem weary - perhaps you are in need of a fresh perspective. If you so desire, I can allow you to retrace your steps with all of the knowledge you currently possess. Simply ask, and I can show you the way!

name: The Not-So-Lost Husband
objective: tell Bellethe that Finnas is okay
first_tasks: take Snowbell and Sunbeam to Bellethe

quest_giver.name: Finnas
quest_giver.description: a grateful man who injured his leg

tools: the player told Finnas that the player came here to rescue him, Snowbell and Sunbeam
description:
You ... you came to rescue us?  Thank the guardians!
I've managed to keep Snowbell and Sunbeam safe up here, but I injured my leg. I can't make my way out of this cave while carrying them. If you'll take them to Bellethe, I'll follow you out at my own pace. Tell Bellethe that I'm okay. My thanks to you for your help!

name: Grom's Arena
objective: prove your worth to Grom
first_tasks: attempt to survive the Arena of Slaughter

reward.description: Grom's vast spoils

tools: many have tried to survive the Arena of Slaughter: now their souls serve Grom
description:
So... you come seeking the wealth of Grom? My spoils are vast, and have no peer in this realm.
There is no path to success for you, lest you survive my arena and prove your worth.
Be forewarned - many have tested their mettle on this bloodstained floor, but none have yet succeeded. Their souls are now mine, and they do as they are bid.
Will you attempt the challenge? I will await your decision.
None have yet triumphed within the walls of my arena.
Perhaps you will be the first?
Perhaps...

name: The Corrupted Guardian
objective: prevent the Alchemist from corrupting and controlling all the world's magic
first_tasks: free the Guardian of Mana from Ezrohir's control

reward.description: the player will thwart the Alchemist's plans

characters.name: Artificer
characters.description: an evil man allied with the Alchemist

characters.name: Alchemist
characters.description: an evil man, the player's enemy

characters.name: Guardian of Mana
characters.description: a good spirit that controls all magic

tools: the player defeated the Artificer in the Vaults: he enslaved the Guardian of Mana for the Alchemist
description:
We must act quickly. It appears that the Artificer you defeated in the Vaults has enslaved the Guardian of Mana for the enemy. The most pressing danger is that they will use the enslaved Guardian to corrupt... and control... all the world's magic. Our only recourse in that event may be to destroy the Guardian.
There might still be hope. If we can find a way to free the Guardian from Ezrohir's control, we can thwart the Alchemist's plans.

name: Breaking the Siege
objective: free the Guardian of Mana
first_tasks: fight your way past the Ezrohir to the Guardian of Mana

first_task_locations.name: Riftkeep
first_task_locations.description: a nearby fortress that was designated as a neutral ground, where the Zeraphi and the Ezrohir could meet and talk over their differences, now occupied by the Ezrohir

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a hostile race of people, originally a faction of the Zeraphi

groups.name: Zeraphi
groups.description: a race of people, the player's allies

tools: NONE
description:
When the Zeraphi and Ezrohir "parted ways," they designated the nearby fortress of Riftkeep as a neutral ground, where they could meet and talk over their differences. But it has remained unused for centuries... until a few weeks ago, when the Ezrohir army seized the fortress. They have occupied it ever since, and that is surely where they are holding the Guardian of Mana while they marshal their forces.
The Ezrohir will be expecting the Zeraphi to attack them at Riftkeep, to attempt to rescue the Guardian. But they know it will take time for the Zeraphi to arrive. You can get there much more quickly, and fight your way inside before they are prepared to repel you.
Go. Fight past the Ezrohir and free the Guardian!

name: Meet the Djinni
objective: convince Fazeer Shah to help you
first_tasks: locate Fazeer Shah
tools: Fazeer Shah and Ezrek Khan went to war centuries ago: they damaged the cities and devastated the land; Zeraphi sultan had enough and banished them both
description:
Centuries ago, a djinni named Fazeer Shah and a djinni named Ezrek Khan quarreled over some trivial matter, and ultimately went to war. They caused considerable damage to the cities, and devastated the land, until the Zeraphi sultan had had enough. He banished them both: one to the desert, and one to... another place; a dark realm.
If you can reach Fazeer Shah, you might be able to convince him to help us.
You must travel out into the Salt Barrens to locate Fazeer Shah.

name: On to Grunnheim!
objective: defeat the Dark Alchemist before he gets to the Clockwork Core
first_tasks: speak to the Railmaster, and depart to Grunnheim

reward.name: Clockwork Core
reward.description: a device that upholds the barriers between different worlds

characters.name: Dark Alchemist
characters.description: an evil man who has stolen the energy of three Guardians

groups.name: Guardians
groups.description: powerful spirits who uphold the balance between the elements

groups.name: Netherim
groups.description: numerous demons residing in another world

tools: the player thought that the Dark Alchemist is after the Guardian Of Air's power: he left the desert for Grunnheim
the Dark Alchemist is powerful enough to destroy the barrier between the player's world and the realm of the Netherim
description:
Let us return to the matter of the Dark Alchemist. He has now stolen the energy of three Guardians, and we thought he desired my power as well. But, for some reason, he has left the desert, and is now en route to Grunnheim.
That can only mean that he is bound for the Clockwork Core. With the power he has amassed, he could destroy the barrier between our world and the realm of the Netherim. They would pour through by the millions.
Seek the Railmaster, and depart for Grunnheim as soon as you are able.

name: The Eve of War
objective: save the Guardian of Mana from the Alchemist and Netherim
first_tasks: seek the Forsaken Vaults, and convince the Sphinx to grant you entry

characters.name: Guardian of Mana
characters.description: a powerful female spirit who is pursuing the Alchemist

characters.name: Sphinx
characters.description: the guardian of the Forsaken Vaults

tools: NONE
description:
I have been expecting you. I am the Guardian of Air.
The Guardian of Mana has pursued the Alchemist into the Forsaken Vaults, which are guarded by the Sphinx. Seek the Vaults, and convince the Sphinx to grant you entry. The Guardian of Mana is in great danger... if not from the Alchemist, then from the Netherim. Save her.

name: Into the Dark
objective: defeat the Alchemist and seize Ordrak's Heart before he destroys the Clockwork Core
first_tasks: overtake the Alchemist before he reaches the Clockwork Core

characters.name: Alchemist
characters.description: a villainous man holding Ordrak's Heart

items.name: Ordrak's Heart
items.description: a powerful relic infused with the energy stolen from the Guardians

items.name: Clockwork Core
items.description: a device that upholds the barriers between the worlds

tools: the Clockwork Core can be restored with Ordrak's Heart
description:
You must overtake the Alchemist before he reaches the Clockwork Core. With the power of Ordrak's Heart, he could destroy the barrier between the worlds, which would mean the end of everything.
You must defeat the Alchemist and seize the Heart. He intends to use it for destruction, but, infused with the energy stolen from the Guardians, it now has the power to restore the Clockwork Core, and repair the damage to the barrier.

name: Freedom!
objective: leave Riftkeep with the Guardian of Mana
first_tasks: enter the portal to Zeryphesh that the Guardian of Mana opens for you
tools: the player freed Guardian of Mana from her enslavement by beating some sense into her
description:
Stop. Enough. You have freed me from my enslavement and I am myself once more!
We must leave this place. I will open a portal for you, to Zeryphesh.

name: Return to the Enclave
objective: stop the Alchemist before he can drain the two Guardians in the Ossean Wastes
first_tasks: talk to Commander Vale about getting to the Ossean Wastes

quest_giver.name: Guardian of the Wild
quest_giver.description: one of the Guardians, drained by the Alchemist

characters.name: Alchemist
characters.description: a male pawn of the Netherim

groups.name: Netherim
groups.description: evil denizens of the Nether Realm

tools: Guardian of the Wild fears that the Alchemist uses the power of the Guardians to open a portal to the Nether Realm, plunging the world into eternal chaos
description:
I fear the Alchemist is a pawn of the Netherim. With the power of the Guardians, a portal to the Nether Realm could be thrown wide, and the world would be plunged into an age of never-ending torment.
Return to the Enclave immediately. Commander Vale can help you secure passage to the Ossean Wastes, where two of my fellow Guardians can be found. Stop the Alchemist before he can drain them as well!

name: Shadow of the Skara
objective: help the Zeraphi any way you can
first_tasks: search for surviving Zeraphi

quest_giver.name: Hareph
quest_giver.description: a relieved Zeraphi master of explosives

tools: Hareph and his Zeraphi crew came to the outpost to deal with the Skara: the crew went to investigate the stacks and never came back
Hareph gives the player explosives
description:
I'm so relieved you have arrived! My crew and I journeyed to this outpost to deal with the increasingly aggressive Skara.
I remained here to fashion additional explosives while my crew investigated the stacks, but they never returned. I have been unable to leave here because of the swarming Skara.
Please take these explosives with you and journey to Swarm Point, and search for any surviving Zeraphi and help them in any way you can!

name: Coming Out Ahead
objective: save the Bronze Head of Grunnheim from destruction by Sturmbeorn
first_tasks: recover the Bronze Head of Grunnheim

first_task_locations.description: the temple, houses thousands of years of historical artifacts and documents, overrun by the Sturmbeorn

quest_giver.name: High Priest Tauna
quest_giver.description: the head priest of the temple

items.name: Bronze Head of Grunnheim
items.description: an artifact that contains records, some of which are the only accounts of major historic events

groups.name: Sturmbeorn
groups.description: brutish bandits who only value gold

tools: NONE
description:
We are relatively safe here, but the brutish Sturmbeorn will surely destroy everything that isn't made of gold! The temple is home to thousands of years of historical artifacts and documents, and it grieves me immeasurably to think of all of those treasures lost!
We were able to gather up some of the artifacts, as we fled, but the Bronze Head of Grunnheim was left behind! Please, find it! Some of its records are the only accounts we have of major historic events!

name: Sudden Outbreaks
objective: save uninfected temple priests from Nether-Thralls
first_tasks: find the temple priests

first_task_locations.name: Watchweald Temple
first_task_locations.description: a temple swept by a plague that transforms priests into Nether-Thralls

tools: after saving the temple priests, the player can focus on aiding the Guardian of the Wild
description:
Thank the Gods you are here! A plague is sweeping through the Watchweald Temple, transforming the temple priests into Nether-Thralls! Several uninfected priests are still inside, trapped by the Nether-Thralls. I can protect them, if I can reach them... or if they can reach me.
Look for places where the temple priests may have hidden from the Nether-Thralls, and send them back here. Once they are all safe, we can focus on aiding the Guardian of the Wild.

name: Onward to Zeryphesh!
objective: travel to Zeryphesh on the Imperial Railmaster's Embercraft
first_tasks: tell the Imperial Railmaster when your ready to go

locations.name: Zeryphesh
locations.description: a town a couple of days travel away from here

tools: the Vanquisher told the Imperial Railmaster that the player is coming to him
description: You're the one the Vanquisher lady told me about, then? Alright... whenever you're ready to get rollin', we'll get your gear aboard our Embercraft, and we'll set out to Zeryphesh. Shouldn't take us more than a couple of days to get there!

name: Blight of the Bugs
objective: discover what has been blighting Skara eggs
first_tasks: find the rigged Skara hives and detonate them
destroy all infected eggs

first_task_locations.name: Brood Hive
first_task_locations.description: the innermost part of the Swarm Point

tools: Hareph sent the player to find his demolition crew: he gave the player explosives
some Skara hives seem to be infected with something
description:
Ah, Hareph sent you with some explosives. Finally some good news!
Don't bother looking for the rest of the crew - I'm the only one that survived. 
There's something wrong with some of the Skara hives - they seem to be infected. You'll need to locate the rigged hives and detonate them, then descend into the Brood Hive itself and destroy any infected eggs you find. Perhaps you will discover what has been blighting the eggs!
This is a great task, but it must be done. We will all be in your debt.

name: Angry Beasts
objective: calm down the Warbeasts
first_tasks: get rid of whatever's making the Warbeasts vicious

first_task_locations.description: Warbeast den, in the Bone Defile

quest_giver.name: Imperial Trapper
quest_giver.description: a ranger working towards the Imperial colonization effort

tools: NONE
description:
I've been charged with culling the Warbeasts here, for the Imperial colonization effort. I can keep their population down, but something is driving them wild, almost like they're rabid or something.
Can you get into the Warbeast den, in the Bone Defile, and get rid of whatever's making them so vicious?

name: Ghost of a Chance
objective: master all challenges
first_tasks: defeat the 5 Spectral Champions

quest_giver.name: Forgotten Hero
quest_giver.description: a ghost of a long-dead hero

reward.description: the Forgotten Hero's most prized possession

tools: NONE
description:
I have been dead a very long time, and in all those centuries, I have not found one soul worthy of taking up the mantle of hero, as I once did, and seeking adventure.
Will you be that hero? I offer you five challenges. Defeat each of the five Spectral Champions in Crows' Pass: these ghostly champions will be your challenges. Should you master them all, my most prized possession is yours...

name: Taking Notes
objective: figure out how to stop the Alchemist
first_tasks: find the 3 Alchemist's Journals that remain

first_task_locations.name: Icedeep Caverns
first_task_locations.description: icy caverns where dangerous creatures dwell

quest_giver.name: Jadok
quest_giver.description: a man who knows the player

items.name: Alchemist's Journals
items.description: a series of journals written by the Alchemist

tools: Jadok found volume 4 of Alchemist's Journals: it describes entering the mine at Torchlight and retrieving Ordrak's Heart
description:
Your arrival is well-timed. I believe I have located the Alchemist's lair, here in the Icedeep Caverns. I found a Journal just inside the entrance; it speaks of entering the mine at Torchlight and retrieving Ordrak's Heart. I intended to look for more, further inside the icy caverns, but the creatures dwelling there now are too much for me.
Finding the rest of the Alchemist's Journals would probably be very helpful in ascertaining how to stop him. The one I saw was volume four, so there are probably three more in the Icedeep Caverns.

name: The Missing Man
objective: find out what happened to Hareph
first_tasks: find Hareph

first_task_locations.name: Swarm Stacks
first_task_locations.description: Skara's nesting place north of here, out in the Salt Barrens

characters.name: Hareph
characters.description: a man, and Jasha's missing friend

tools: Hareph left with a crew to determine why the Skara have become aggressive
description:
If you're heading out into the Salt Barrens, could you find out what happened to my companion Hareph?
He left with a crew to determine why the Skara have become so aggressive lately, but no one has come back.
If you travel North to the Swarm Stacks, you should be able to find him - or at least what happened to him.

name: The Locket
objective: bring the Locket to Jessa
first_tasks: find the Locket
tools: the player told Jessa that her father is dead
description:
Oh, my poor father - I cannot believe that he is gone! Dear father...
Please try to retrieve the Locket - it belonged to my father. I cannot bear to think that it is lost in this foul place, corroding away in swamp water. He must have dropped it somewhere around here...

name: The Wraithring
objective: discover Jessa's father's fate
first_tasks: find Jessa's father

first_task_locations.description: the catacombs, where dark things live

items.name: Wraithring
items.description: an ancient artifact which is said to have power over death

tools: Jessa and her father came here to recover the Wraithring: they wanted to bring it to the Temple for study
Jessa's father wears a locket around his neck
description:
Please, traveler! Wait a moment! I am Jessa - a traveler from Estheria. My father and I came to this place to recover an ancient artifact - the Wraithring - which is said to have power over death itself. We sought to bring it to the Temple for study.
My father entered the catacombs while I tended our camp - but he has not returned, and there are dark things stirring below.
Please - I only ask that you discover his fate - perhaps he is wounded and only needs aid to escape!
If the worst comes to pass... he wears a locket around his neck, and you will know him by it.

name: The Key to Victory
objective: help Lord Taldimut gather up weapons and armor from the Celestial Armory without Ezrohir noticing
first_tasks: use the Golden Gear to get inside the Celestial Armory, and activate the Armory Portal

first_task_locations.name: Celestial Armory
first_task_locations.description: Lord Taldimut's armory that houses some of the finest weapons

quest_giver.name: Lord Taldimut
quest_giver.description: the player's old friend, who promised the player a a greater reward if the player came to visit him in Ossean Wastes

reward.description: the player's choice of artifacts from the Celestial Armory

items.name: Armory Portal
items.description: a hidden portal to the Celestial Armory

tools: Ezrohir have the Celestial Armory under siege
description:
It's good to see you again, my friend! I know that I promised you a greater reward, should you come to visit... but that was before I returned to the Ossean Wastes and found the Celestial Armory under siege by Ezrohir.
What if I give you your choice of artifacts from the Armory? The Celestial Armory houses some of the finest weapons in the world! You have but to use the Golden Gear to get inside, then activate the Armory Portal, which will allow us to gather up the weapons and armor safely... with the Ezrohir none the wiser!

name: The Lost Key
objective: help Lord Taldimut bring the Golden Gear to Zeryphesh
first_tasks: recover the Golden Gear

items.name: Golden Gear
items.description: important object related to defense of Zeryphesh

tools: Lord Taldimut has been studying the crests
description: I have continued studying the crests, and I am more convinced than ever that the Golden Gear is hidden in the the Whispering Cave. If you can retrieve it, I can bring it back to Zeryphesh, to aid in the city's defense against the Ezrohir siege.

name: The Zeraphi Envoy
objective: help Lord Taldimut narrow down the location of the Golden Gear
first_tasks: find the 3 crests for Lord Taldimut

quest_giver.name: Lord Taldimut
quest_giver.description: a Zeraphi ambassador, the leader of the Zeraphi envoy

reward.description: Lord Taldimut will reward the player

items.name: Golden Gear
items.description: important object related to defense of Zeraphi
crests, created by the Estherians, together form a map that shows the exact location of the Golden Gear

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a hostile race of people who will start a war with Zeraphi

groups.name: Estherians
groups.description: a race of people, friendly towards the Zeraphi

tools: the player saved Lord Taldimut and his Zeraphi envoy from goblins
Grand Regent Eldrayn allowed Lord Taldimut and his Zeraphi envoy to search for the Golden Gear
description:
My friend, thank you for coming to our aid. I am Lord Taldimut, the leader of this Zeraphi envoy, sent to procure the Estherians' aid in our upcoming war with the Ezrohir. Grand Regent Eldrayn gave us leave to search the Frosted Hills for the Golden Gear, and we had narrowed our search to these chilly hills before we were assaulted by these goblins.
Now we are too injured to continue our search. Can you aid us? The exact location of the Golden Gear is long forgotten, but the Estherians created a map from three crests. If you can find those, I can interpret the map and find the Gear! Search the Frosted Hills for the crests. Bring them to me, and I will reward you, on behalf of the Zeraphi people.

name: *Seeing Things
objective: help Guard kill invisible demons
first_tasks: kill the invisible demons that surround Guard
tools: NONE
description:
Thank the Gods you're here! These... demons just came out of nowhere! I've been able to hold them off so far, but, with you here, we'll soon triumph over them!
Why are you looking at me like that? Can't you see them? They're all around us! Please... you've got to believe me!

name: The Growing Rift
objective: see whether the Rift is closed; if not, close it
first_tasks: find the Rift

first_task_locations.name: Gravedeep
first_task_locations.description: a pit mine in the Sundered Battlefield

items.name: Rift
items.description: a hole between this world and the world of evil, powerful demons

tools: NONE
description:
Listen: If you're headed out to the Sundered Battlefield, there's something you should know. We were surveying out there, and discovered some kind of... hole, in thin air, in the pit mine we've been calling Gravedeep. The hole is very small, right now, but we could see things inside... powerful things, but horrible. Malign.
If you're going out there, see if you can find the hole. If we're lucky, it disappeared. But, if not, you should do your best to find a way to close it, before the things we saw get through!

name: A High-Value Target
objective: prevent the Ezrohir from interrogating Commander Muzaffar
first_tasks: rescue Commander Muzaffar from the Ezrohir, before they take him to Riftkeep

locations.name: Zeryphesh
locations.description: a large city inhabited by the Zeraphi

characters.name: Commander Muzaffar
characters.description: the military leader of the Zeraphi, captured by the Ezrohir

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a hostile race of people who are at war with Zeraphi

tools: the Ezrohir are preparing to assault Zeryphesh
description:
Greetings, my friend! Welcome to Zeryphesh! I am Malik Vosh. I speak for the Zeraphi.
As you know, the Ezrohir are preparing to assault our city. Our military leader, Commander Muzaffar, has apparently been captured by the Ezrohir, out in the Ossean Wastes. They'll have sent for soldiers to take their prisoners back to their stronghold. Once they get him to Riftkeep, they'll identify him quickly enough, and then they'll interrogate him until they know everything about our defenses.
I believe you're going out to the Ossean Wastes, the vast desert. Please, rescue Muzaffar. We need him.

name: An Enchanter in Chains
objective: get your reward from Malo
first_tasks: go see Malo

reward.description: a reward

tools: the player freed Malo from bandits
description:
Oh, thank you so much!  Here I was, afraid I'd never enchant anything ever again!
I'm was on my way to the Estherian Enclave when these brigands ambushed me. Once I gather my wits, I'll head over there. Come by and see me, if you get a chance! I'll have a reward for you.

name: The Crab Trap
objective: stop the Ezrohir from getting scrap metal from the crabs
first_tasks: prevent the Crab King from finishing his negotiations with the Ezrohir

reward.description: a potion

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a hostile race of people who are at war with Zeraphi

tools: the player is a friend of the Zeraphi
description:
Your timing is perfect, my friend! Below us, in the Dead Shoals, the Crab King is negotiating with a representative of the Ezrohir, to provide the Ezrohir with a huge cache of scrap metal they have salvaged. The Ezrohir will use that scrap to forge more arms to bring against us! They must be stopped!
I beg you: Go down into the Dead Shoals and prevent the Crab King from concluding his negotiations with the Ezrohir! I realize this is not much in the way of a reward, but this potion is all I can offer.

name: The Merryweather Poultice
objective: help Medrus treat himself
first_tasks: bring some Merryweather Leaves to Medrus

reward.description: Medrus will reward the player

tools: NONE
description:
Hello! I thought I heard someone moving around out there.
Listen, my name's Medrus. I got ambushed by some raiders, and managed to get clear... but I got pretty badly injured in the process. I can treat it, but I need some Merryweather Leaves. They grow around here, but I'm too weak to look for them.
Think you can find some for me, bring 'em back here? You'll be rewarded, I promise.

name: The Scroll of Anom-Irek
objective: retrieve the Scroll of Anom-Irek, and return to Miamin
first_tasks: find the Scroll of Anom-Irek in a vault

first_task_locations.name: Corrupted Crypt
first_task_locations.description: a crypt crawling with the Sturmbeorn in the Path of the Honored Dead

reward.description: equipment fit for a hero

tools: the player has helped Estherians before
description:
You must be the human the other Estherians are speaking of. I am glad to have met you. I have been sent on a quest to recover the Scroll of Anom-Irek, stored in a vault in the Corrupted Crypt, here. The scroll should allow us to heal the Estherians who have been corrupted by evil spirits. Unfortunately, the Sturmbeorn have already entered the crypt, and I have been unable to get past them.
Can I ask you to attempt to retrieve the scroll? I will wait here in the Path of the Honored Dead for your return. Should you succeed, I will see what I can do to provide you with some equipment more fitting a hero of your stature.

name: Tower of the Moon
objective: see if there are Ezrohir scouts at the Tower of the Moon
first_tasks: deal with any Ezrohir scouts you find

first_task_locations.name: Tower of the Moon
first_task_locations.description: an ancient tower in the Ossean Wastes, near Zeryphesh

locations.name: Zeryphesh
locations.description: a city-state located in the Ossean Wastes

locations.name: Forsaken Vaults
locations.description: a dungeon located far out in the Ossean Wastes

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a race of people who are at war with Zeryphesh

tools: NONE
description:
My friend, I have a mission for you. You may have noticed the Ezrohir activity in the Ossean Wastes. We believe these are scouts operating out of the Forsaken Vaults, but they are appearing so close to the city gates that we think they might have a base much nearer, from which they are spying on us.
We have narrowed down the possibilities, and I want you to look into the Tower of the Moon, an ancient tower jutting from the Ossean Wastes. Determine if there are any Ezrohir scouts there... and if you find any, deal with them.

name: One Man's Trash
objective: find out whether a used Ember can be recharged, and return to Nerasis
first_tasks: attempt to charge the Spent Ember

first_task_locations.name: Tarroch's Rift
first_task_locations.description: a mana-rich area with horrible monsters

quest_giver.name: Nerasis
quest_giver.description: a a researcher working for the Empire

reward.name: NONE
reward.description: Nerasis will pay the player

tools: NONE
description:
Hello there! I wonder if you have a moment to help me out? My name is Nerasis; I'm a researcher for the Empire. I've been working on a theory that used Ember can be recharged, with exposure to a suitably large source of mana. My research led me to Tarroch's Rift, where the mana output ratio is... well, it's very high.
The problem is that there are quite a few horrible monsters between me and the mana source. I would be willing to pay you to take this burned-out Spent Ember into Tarroch's Rift and attempt to charge it, then bring it back here so I can see if my theory is correct.

name: Ghosts of Plunder Cove
objective: avenge Olwin
first_tasks: find the hidden refuge of Captain Willy, and kill him

quest_giver.name: Olwin
quest_giver.description: a ghost of a man who was betrayed and drowned by his evil companions

characters.name: Captain Willy
characters.description: the leader of Olwin's murderers, a male ghost pirate

tools: NONE
description:
I mean you no harm; I am but a lonely soul, trapped in the afterlife. Betrayed and drowned by villainous companions, I dwell here, reliving my end, waiting in vain for my death to be avenged.
But it has been over a hundred years since I took my last breath, and nearly that many since my murderers themselves perished, in their hidden retreat in Plunder Cove. Seek their leader, Captain Willy. Show him that justice has neither forgotten him... nor forgiven him!

name: Ghostly Justice
objective: avenge Larry
first_tasks: find Captain Stillheart, and kill him

quest_giver.name: Larry
quest_giver.description: a ghost of a former tomb raider, who was left to die by his former accomplices

characters.name: Captain Stillheart
characters.description: the leader of Larry's former accomplices, a male ghost

tools: NONE
description:
I was a villain, in my time. I broke into tombs and stole from the dead. But, one day, I realized how much pain I had caused those still living... and I swore it would stop.
My comrades... my accomplices... felt differently. They lured me out into these desolate sands and left me to die. My spirit has haunted this place ever since, bound here by the weight of my sins, hoping for vengeance. But they perished elsewhere, beyond my reach, even though they are now spirits as well. Seek their leader, Captain Stillheart, in Plunder Cove, and show him that justice can still find him!

name: On the Alchemist's Trail
objective: stop the Alchemist
first_tasks: go after the Alchemist

quest_giver.name: Professor Stoker
quest_giver.location: next to the entrance to the Broken Mines

tools: the Alchemist went into the Broken Mines: he is nearing his goal
description:
This is the only entrance to the Broken Mines that we've found, so the Alchemist is almost certainly in there. That probably means he's near his goal, whatever that is... and that means he'll do everything he can to keep you from stopping him. He'll be even more desperate, more dangerous.
I don't know what we'll encounter in there.

name: Robot Parts
objective: talk to the 4000 Model
first_tasks: let Professor Stoker put the parts of the 4000 Model back together
tools: the player brought parts of the 4000 Model to Professor Stoker
description: What do we have here?  Wow, this is a 4000 Model robot! These are quite old - this one appears to have had a lot of work done to it. Not sure why it's in pieces - why don't we find out! Let me just put these together for you and we'll see what it has to say for itself.

name: Some Assembly Required
objective: open the Great Door
first_tasks: find a power source for the dwarven automaton

locations.name: Great Door
locations.description: a door that leads to the Clockwork Core

tools: the Alchemist came through the Imperial Camp an hour ago: he went through the Great Door and sealed it behind him
the Great Door leads to the Clockwork Core
description:
I wish you had gotten here sooner! The Alchemist came through here about an hour ago. He laid waste to the camp and then went through the Great Door, there - sealed it shut behind him.
We believe that door leads to the Clockwork Core. We've been unable to open it ourselves, but we know how in theory. See that dwarven automaton? It's designed to open the door, but it's missing its Power Source. There should be one in the Scrapworks, but it was too dangerous for us to enter. Perhaps you will have more luck.

name: The Sundered Battlefield
objective: recharge the power source, and return to Professor Stoker to install the power source in the automaton
first_tasks: reach the the Sundered Battlefield
find the Emberworks on the far side of the Sundered Battlefield
tools: the player brought a power source to Professor Stoker: it is completely drained
description:
Oh, no... I was afraid of this! The Power Source is completely drained! This is going to be more difficult than I'd anticipated. This is only a minor setback. We knew about these Power Sources from our explorations of the Emberworks, on the far side of the Sundered Battlefield. We found machines there that the ancient dwarves once used to craft them. If you can reach the Emberworks, it should be child's play to recharge it.
You'll have to make your way through Rivenskull Pass to reach the battlefield. Once you've charged the Power Source, come back here, and we'll install it in the Automaton.

name: Endless Adventure
objective: navigate to all sorts of places from the Mapworks
first_tasks: go on an adventure
tools: NONE
description: The legendary Mapworks is operational once more! From the Mapworks, you can navigate to all sorts of wondrous places! Many fine adventures surely await you within.

name: Enter the Door
objective: recover the Crown from Thiss, and bring it to Robot Eye
first_tasks: find Thiss

quest_giver.name: Robot Eye
quest_giver.description: an arrogant person guarding the door

reward.description: the player will be allowed through the door

characters.name: Thiss
characters.description: a great spectral dragon who stole the Crown from Robot Eye

tools: the player told Robot Eye that the player wants to go through the door
description:
You want through THIS door? Ha! Well, it's not as simple as that. Everything has a price - you must know that by now.
If you can solve a problem for us, we will solve a problem for you by letting you through the door. Thiss, the great Spectral Dragon, has kept something of ours for many long years. We would like it back - and you will get it for us, oh yes.
There is a Crown, a... family heirloom that he stole from us. He will not give it up easily, of course. But this door is im-PENETRABLE - so you've got a much better chance with Thiss than you do waiting around here.
You can find Thiss in the Forgotten Halls... good luck! You're going to need it.

name: Bring Out Your Dead
objective: recover the Rosamortis for Selrenki
first_tasks: convince the spirits to unlock the Ghost Chains
get the Rosamortis away from its big undead guardian

first_task_locations.name: Bone Gallery
first_task_locations.description: a crypt whose entrance is locked with the Ghost Chains

reward.description: Selrenki makes it worth the player's while

items.name: Ghost Chains
items.description: chains that only a ghost can open

items.name: Rosamortis
items.description: a valuable little item that can save the life of someone who's been mortally wounded

tools: NONE
description:
I got a proposition for you... a little "I scratch my back, you scratch yours" kind of thing. See this crypt over here? It's called the Bone Gallery, and there's a little thing in there called the Rosamortis... a handy little thingamajig that can save the life of someone who's been mortally wounded... which, while pretty valuable, is also guarded by the biggest undead monstrosity I've ever seen!
Also, the entrance to the Bone Gallery is locked with chains only a ghost can open! You'll have to convince the spirits to unlock the Ghost Chains and give you access, then get the Rosamortis away from that monster... but I promise to make it worth your while!

name: Artifice of Evil
objective: save the Guardian of Mana, and Zeryphesh
first_tasks: find the Guardian of Mana

first_task_locations.name: Vaults Forsaken
first_task_locations.description: a foul dungeon filled with Ezrohir

quest_giver.name: Sphinx
quest_giver.description: a statue that speaks in riddles

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a race of people who are at war with Zeryphesh

tools: the Ezrohir captured the Guardian of Mana again: they stripped away her magic and enslaved her
description:
The Ezrohir prepare today for war
Their legions number in the score.
Their Alchemy and Artifice suffice
To capture Mana... not once but twice.
Imprisoned in the Vaults Forsaken:
Subdued, enslaved, her magic taken.
Forced to lead their troops in battle
From Guardian... to so much chattel.
The Ezrohir have Mana enslaved
But there's still hope; she might yet be saved.
The enemy lie in this foul creche.
Save the Guardian... save Zeryphesh.

name: Lair of the Manticore
objective: bring the skin of the Manticore to the Sphinx
first_tasks: kill the Manticore

quest_giver.name: Sphinx
quest_giver.description: the riddle-speaking guardian of the gate
quest_giver.location: the entrance to the Forsaken Vaults, at a desert

reward.description: the Sphinx allows the player passage through the gate

enemies.name: Manticore
enemies.description: a half drake, a half lion beast

tools: NONE
description:
My ancient charge, to guard the gate
The desert sands to contemplate.
In Stygian realm lurks beast of yore
Part drake, part lion: Manticore.
Lay its skin before my eyes
And passage through shall be your prize.

name: Perilous Passage
objective: save the Mana Queen
first_tasks: go through the gate to the Forsaken Vaults

quest_giver.name: Sphinx
quest_giver.description: the guardian of the Forsaken Vaults, speaks in rhymes
quest_giver.location: the gate to the Forsaken Vaults

tools: NONE
description:
The Mana Queen has come and gone
Through this gate, she journeyed on.
Follow her and pay the cost.
Hasten forth, or she'll be lost.

name: The Blue Boletus
objective: bring Blue Boletus flesh to Sprocket
first_tasks: get Blue Boletus flesh

first_task_locations.name: Fungal Caves
first_task_locations.description: the only place where Blue Boletus grow

reward.description: Sprocket will be in the player's debt

items.name: Black Blindness
items.description: a disease peculiar to the Ponya, which dims the vision and makes speech impossible permanently after two weeks, can only be cured with Blue Boletus flesh

tools: Sprocket traveled here from his home village to find Blue Boletus for his cousins who are afflicted with the Black Blindness
description:
Oh, please - perhaps you can help us! On the advice of our village's healer, I have traveled here seeking a cure. My cousins are afflicted with the Black Blindness, an ailment peculiar to our race.
Black Blindness is an insidious disease - it dims the vision and makes speech impossible, and if not treated within a few weeks, can become permanent. The only known treatment is produced from the flesh of the Blue Boletus - a species of mushroom creatures that grows only in the Fungal Caves near here. I find that they are, ah, BIGGER than I had anticipated, however.
Perhaps YOU could retrieve some Blue Boletus flesh for us? We would be forever in your debt!

name: A Shattered Visage Lies
objective: help the Faceless King reunite the Zeraphi and Ezrohir
first_tasks: find the Royal Masks, and bring them to the Faceless King

quest_giver.name: Faceless King
quest_giver.description: the former king of the Zeraphi and Ezrohir, an immortal man

items.name: Royal Masks
items.description: the masks of the royal line, keys to the Vault of Souls

groups.name: Zeraphi, Ezrohir
groups.description: two warring races of people who were once one race

locations.name: Vault of Souls
locations.description: a place where the Faceless King can reunite the Zeraphi and Ezrohir

tools: NONE
description:
I am called the Faceless King, and I have resided here since the Zeraphi and Ezrohir were one race. I was their king. It has been my dream to reunite them by accessing the Vault of Souls, but the Vault will not open without the masks of the royal line, which were stolen from me ages ago.
If you can locate the Royal Masks and return them to me, I can unlock the Vault of Souls, and reunite the Zeraphi and Ezrohir! Please, my mortal friend... help me end this war.

name: Getting One's Bearings
objective: find the Azimuthoscope
first_tasks: follow the trail of Trill-Bot 4000's parts

reward.description: Trill-Bot 4000 can direct the player toward another treasure trove

tools: the player showed Trill-Bot 4000 a robot component
description:
I believe you have found one of my missing components! There appears to be a trail of them, leading toward that dungeon.
If you follow the trail of my Parts, it might lead you to my Azimuthoscope: the component I need to direct you to another treasure trove!

name: Loose Connections
objective: reacquire the rest of Trill-Bot 4000's components
first_tasks: find the Cognition Linkage

reward.description: Trill-Bot 4000 will direct the player toward a treasure trove

tools: the player found Trill-Bot 4000's body, which stores his memories
description:
It appears you have found my body. Very good. This is where my memories are stored … including the locations of multiple caches of treasure. I could share these with you, if you would help me reacquire the rest of my components.
We should begin with my Cognition Linkage. Without that, I won't be able to do much more than repeat this message. My sensors tell me it is somewhere nearby. Find it and reinstall it, and I will direct you to one of those treasure troves.

name: The Three Sisters
objective: find the 3 sisters
first_tasks: investigate a tree trunk in an area full of spiders

quest_giver.name: Trill
quest_giver.description: a great bard who received a blow to the head in Torchlight

locations.name: Torchlight
locations.description: a city in Veras that was destroyed

tools: Trill is known throughout Veras: from Torchlight to Redhaven
description:
Greetings! I am the great bard Trill. You've heard of me of course, my talent is known throughout all of Veras. From Torchlight to Redhaven they sing of my.. songs.
Torchlight... did something happen there? I feel a bit... Ah, nevermind. I recognize this place!
The spiders called, the Sisters three, the old trunk yawning wide,
Through ancient halls, dark ancestry, they met their fates inside.
An apt verse, you'll agree. I wrote it myself of course.
The rest of the song eludes me... Leniency please! Of course such a lapse is unforgivable in a great bard such as myself, but I feel a bit.. off.
Still, even that bare fragment of verse can lead you to glory. Go forth, brave warrior, and slay the mighty beasts! Whatever they may be...

name: Body Work
objective: restore Umahd's physical form
first_tasks: find the Ezrohir marauder who wears Umahd's wrappings

reward.description: Umahd shall reward the player

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a race of spirits, enemies of the Zeraphi

tools: NONE
description:
I am no ghost, only disembodied spirit: a Zeraphi warrior, torn from his wrappings, but unable to tear himself away from this world. Umahd is my name. I was defeated in battle, and my physical form taken from me, and made to serve the Ezrohir. But the Ezrohir Marauder who wears my wrappings has returned, no doubt thinking me long gone.
Find that Ezrohir Marauder! Restore my physical form, and I shall reward you!

name: The Cave-In
objective: clear the way to the Scrapworks
first_tasks: find dynamite

quest_giver.name: Officer
quest_giver.description: a military officer working for the Professor

reward.description: you'll be able to pass though to the Scrapworks

tools: the Professor sent the player after the power source in the Scrapworks: the Officer and his troop are on the same mission
the Officer sent his troop to the Abandoned Sawmill: he has not heard from them
description:
So, the Professor sent you after the Power Source? We were on the same mission, but the only way to the Scrapworks is through that pile of rock.
I know the Abandoned Sawmill used to have plenty of explosives from when the place was still in operation - a little bit of dynamite would probably get the job done here.
I sent my troop after it, but haven't heard a thing. If you can head up there and get that dynamite, we could all pass through and get the Professor what he needs.

name: The Warbeast Armory
objective: steal the armor schematics
first_tasks: get inside the Sturmbeorn makeshift smithy
tools: two Sturmbeorn blacksmiths are making suits of armor for Warbeasts
description:
If you're going out to the Temple Steppes, I could use your help. The Sturmbeorn have set up a makeshift smithy there, and they have two blacksmiths making suits of armor for wild Warbeasts they've captured.
Those Sturmbeorn seem to be working from schematics, but they keep them under lock and key. Do you think you might be able to get in there and grab the armor schematics?

name: Fade's Passage
objective: ask Fade to open the hidden passage to Cacklespit's realm
first_tasks: search for the shrines that mark Fade's resting place

first_task_locations.name: Sundered Battlefield
first_task_locations.description: an ancient battlefield in the north

characters.name: Cacklespit
characters.description: a female witch who has been harassing the player

characters.name: Fade
characters.description: a male spirit, who may want something for his help

tools: the player helped Widget and his cousins in the past
description:
Since you helped us in our time of need, we have been searching for a way to return the favor.
It seems you've met with some unexpected trouble from Cacklespit the witch. I've done a little research, and if you'd like to find her, I think I can help!
From the lore I've been able to piece together, there is a secret way to her hidden realm. The spirit, Fade, can open the way - but he may ask for something in return. You'll have to journey to the Sundered Battlefield in the north. Search for the shrines that mark Fade's resting place. I hope this helps you on your way! I'll keep researching in hopes of finding more information to help you.

name: The Malicious Ones
objective: prevent the Ezrohir from defiling the water supply of Zeryphesh
first_tasks: destroy the Ezrohir machines

groups.name: Ezrohir
groups.description: a race of people who are at war with Zeryphesh

tools: NONE
description: The Ezrohir have installed some infernal devices in the Undercurrents, defiling the supply of water entering Zeryphesh. You must destroy those machines, or Zeryphesh cannot stand against the Ezrohir!
